item.description:
Anthony Santander, if he has indeed played his final game in a Baltimore uniform, wraps up his Orioles career ranked 13th in HRs (155), 15th in slugging percentage (.469), 22nd in RBIs (435) and 22nd in total bases (1,327).
One of their best power hitters of the last 20 years.
item.author: Matt Weyrich (@ByMattWeyrich)

item.description:
With Anthony Santander signing for at least $50M, the Orioles will now receive two compensation picks in this year's draft for Santander and Corbin Burnes leaving in free agency.
The picks will be just after the first round, in the early 30s.
item.author: Matt Weyrich (@ByMattWeyrich)
